text: Date night … sort of! Katie Holmes and Jamie Foxx were spotted holding hands as they arrived to the Lumiere de Vie Hommes Launch yacht party in NYC on Saturday, October 13, before spending the evening apart. “ Jamie was holding Katie ’ s hand when they got out of their car and then they walked onto the boat together, ” an onlooker told Us Weekly about their arrival at Chelsea Piers prior to the event. The insider noted that “ Jamie held her hand as she stepped up onto the ramp and they looked very much like a couple, ” before the pair “ walked quickly through the party and were taken to private quarters in the back, where Katie stayed the rest of the night. ” However, just because the 39 - year - old Dawson ’ s Creek alum stayed put, it didn
